snippet: The Rangers are on an upswing lately, but the Canucks, the team they swapped coaches with before this season and will face Tuesday, are in 10th place in the Western Conference.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers are on an upswing lately, but the Canucks, the team they swapped coaches with before this season and will face Tuesday, are in 10th place in the Western Conference.

headline.main: Tortorella and Vancouver Experience Frustrating Turnabout
headline.print_headline: Tortorella and Vancouver Experience Frustrating Turnabout
